title: Genetic Analysis of Familial Cases of Premature Ovarian Failure

operands.value: Female subjects between 16 and 40 years
women older than 40 years with a cessation of ovarian function before the age of 40 years with increased levels of FSH
Primary or secondary amenorrhea for more than three months with LH and FSH > 30mUI/ml
cases of fragile X syndrome in the family
cases of blepharophimosis syndrome in the family
At least two cases in the family
Origin Caucasian
Patient signing the consent form for at least the blood sample
Patient with Social Security
The presence of cycles until the age of 40 years with proven fertility, at least one child
Amenorrhea and FSH > 30mUI/ml according to the criteria of the index subject
Men of the family of index case
Women of Caucasian origin
Women who had regular cycles until at least age 40 and at least one child
history of thyroid disease or diabetes type 1
Woman signing the consent form for at least the blood sample
Must have minimum age of 16 Years
Blood donation of more than 450ml in the previous three months
Subject with an abnormal karyotype in favor of Turner syndrome or having a premutation of the FMR1 gene or a syndromic form
Subject exclusion period in another study without direct individual benefit
Subject refusing to sign the consent form

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('At least two cases in the family'), Symbol('Female subjects between 16 and 40 years'), Symbol('Origin Caucasian'), Symbol('Patient signing the consent form for at least the blood sample'), Symbol('Patient with Social Security'), Symbol('Primary or secondary amenorrhea for more than three months with LH and FSH > 30mUI/ml'), Symbol('women older than 40 years with a cessation of ovarian function before the age of 40 years with increased levels of FSH'), Not(Or(Symbol('cases of blepharophimosis syndrome in the family'), Symbol('cases of fragile X syndrome in the family'))), Not(Or(Symbol('Blood donation of more than 450ml in the previous three months'), Symbol('Subject exclusion period in another study without direct individual benefit'), Symbol('Subject refusing to sign the consent form'), Symbol('Subject with an abnormal karyotype in favor of Turner syndrome or having a premutation of the FMR1 gene or a syndromic form'))), Or(And(Symbol('Amenorrhea and FSH > 30mUI/ml according to the criteria of the index subject'), Symbol('Men of the family of index case'), Symbol('The presence of cycles until the age of 40 years with proven fertility, at least one child')), And(Symbol('Must have minimum age of 16 Years'), Symbol('Woman signing the consent form for at least the blood sample'), Symbol('Women of Caucasian origin'), Symbol('Women who had regular cycles until at least age 40 and at least one child'), Not(Symbol('history of thyroid disease or diabetes type 1')))))
